_xResult.title: Catch Me Breathless Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made haute couture dress with long sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
The air is sucked out of the room the second you make an appearance in this specialized custom made evening gown. This dress has details that we can’t get enough of: a hand-crafted pattern, tasteful bell-sleeves, striking mid-calf length and ruffled airy collar. Just looking at it makes us feel as light as a feather—imagine how you will feel wearing it!

Aiste says “I begin with rolls of plain material and sew hundreds of small seams onto it, creating my own unique textured cloth.  Apparel from this texturized material will not become wrinkly; wherever you may go, simply pack them to your travel bag.  No additional ironing is needed before you wear this garment."

 For custom made requests regarding sizing, let Aiste know your desired measurements using the button below.

properties.propvalue: Spot or hand wash cold, dry flat. Dry clean ok.
